WorkItem.ClosedComment: Should be doing something that is actually possible to perform in next patch
WorkItem.Description:
The Cast Simulation selection under Options > Role uses a 6 second cooldown for Penance and 7 second cooldown for Prayer of Mending.
 
The result is a rotation that cannot be followed and overstates a Discipline Priest's maximum and sustained throughput by about 15%.
 
The correct cooldowns are as follows:
Prayer of Mending = 10 seconds (discipline cannot reach the cooldown reduction 50 pts within the Holy tree).
Penance unglyphed & untalented = 12 seconds
Penance unglyphed & talented = 9.6/10.8 seconds
Penance glyphed and untalented = 10 seconds
Penance glyphed and talented = 8/9 seconds
WorkItem.Summary: [HealPriest] Incorrect cooldown values used in simulation output

Comments.Message: Interesting, will take a closer look when I get the time.
You are right, I have updated the values to something that is possible to perform.
